name: Lilo Platform Adventure BETA
description: This game is a prototype Lilo Game made using Construct 3. Comes with a free copy of Lilo's Adventure 11. Open the file "LiloPlatformer.c3p" in the construct 3 editor. Try running the project, it might take a few tries since it's still a little buggy. If that doesn't work. Enjoy your free exe file of Lilo's Adventure 11! Comes with Lilo Sprite Sheet.
